item.title: OpenAI’s hyper realistic AI video generator Sora launches today, MKBHD reports
item.description: OpenAI imposes fairly strict guardrails against generating likenesses of real people and violence and explicit themes.

item.title: A new benchmark for AI investment: Swift Ventures unveils system to separate talk from action
item.description: Swift Ventures launches an index of public companies truly investing in AI, showing 37% annual growth and outperforming the Nasdaq and S&P.

item.title: How Databricks is using synthetic data to simplify evaluation of AI agents
item.description: Multiple enterprises are using Databricks' synthetic data API, seeing a significant time reduction to improve agent quality and deployment.

item.title: Adobe brings generative AI and real-time personalization to AWS: Here’s what’s next
item.description: Adobe expands Experience Platform to AWS in landmark partnership, revolutionizing enterprise AI and customer data management with advanced personaliza...

item.title: ChatGPT’s second birthday: What will gen AI (and the world) look like in another 2 years?
item.description: We've come a long way in 2 years. Gen AI is the future, but how is it reshaping enterprise? And when will we reach AGI and superintelligence?
